data.author: Steven Albrechtsen

changelog.release_notes:
I know this app needs improvement, but it isn't worth my time right now as my schedule is very tight.

Please contribute to my developing by contributing just $0.99 through Kiezel Pay. This will help to make the development of the app more worth my time.

With your contribution, I can expand the app to include:

- Multiple, savable counters (with names and labels etc.)
- Redesigned UI (With customizable options)
- Animated number updating
- Much more

Please email me with your comments, feature suggestions, bugs, and complaints. Thank you!

VERSION 2.0

- Redesigned UI!

- Counter saves data, even if you exit the app and return later!

A simple app to count anything you need to!

Instructions:

Up Button: Add by 1
Select Button: Reset
Down Button: Decrease by 1

This is definitely a 1.0 release. Further updates are in progress

Coming Features:

-Improved design layout including button labels
-Data saved after exiting app
-Animated number entry
-Much, much, more!

data.description:
A simple app to count anything you need to!

NEW FEATURES

- Counter stays the same even if you exit the app and come back!
- New UI

Instructions:

Up Button: Add by 1
Select Button: Reset
Down Button: Decrease by 1

Coming Soon:

-Pebble and Pebble Steel Support
-Animated number entry
-Much, much, more!
